Obath   maharagama  sajith   athara   wenasak  neoprene.   Sajithge  wismitha  buddiya   gana   sithaa   balanna.  Mamada  mahinda  paakshikayaki .  Namuth  Asabbya   wachana  liweema  anumatha  nokarami
@Sabani Dananjana55 ai wesiye ube ammatath sambandan puke ariyada...waren totath hukanna kari balliye
Thou wesige.putha jathaka wela thiyenne thoge amma sambandan ge miniha nisa. Thota ekai para demala loku une. Thopi ithuru wela inne  rate awasanawata... SAKKILIYA....
Sambandan Ona kiyana awunta Bomba gahapalla

Uba demalata passa deepan eita
wediya hondai.Sinhala kotiya.
Ballo thopi hithuwa thope huthiyo ara kalu redda asse hengiya gihin karanawa wage kiyala thota weradila para thmbiya
uba ganiwa dipan uta Puka arinda ponnaya toot Puka dipiya namila sambandan kiyana ballata

Sambandan  mathidu  ethakota  mahinda  balla  ane  ponnayo  ethakota  tho  kawda. Ponna  katha  kiyanna  epa  yako  meeta  hodai  thoge  ammawahari  geniwahari  uta  deela  hukaganna  kiwwa nam. Ponnaya  tho  ada  me polawe paya gahala inne  ara manussaya  ranawiruwo  ekka dinadeepu rata  hinda.  Keri  demalata  puka  nodee  idapan
Obe  buddiya  athi  wisistai  jaya  wewa

To mona ponna pakayekda yako  mahinda balla una sambandan mathiduni una awajathaka balla to demalata puka dena wesa ballek to hithuwada meka demalage budale kiyala rata vinasa karapu aka tota loku una rata baragaththa kenata to balla kiuwa dasapalane paththaka dala katha karapiya sinhalayek vidiyata ponna balla
Thopita hukanna baha na thopi lankawa prasidda ponnayo na kari balla
Ane  UnP  hiwala  ... modaya... uda  balagena  kela  gaha  ganin
Keri ponnaya tho ammata hukana ekek wage tirisana
ane pala gemmo tonam sinhalayek newi awajathaka ballek
Puka dipan huththa kotinta pakaya ratata hena gahuwath kamakne thopita thope paksaya rakaganna unp ponna huththo
